definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: knead (NH id.; Aram. [[לוּשׁ]], lo4, Eth. lu4a: or lusa:);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַּתָּ֫לָשׁ]] 1Sa 28:24, 2Sa 13:8 Qr (Kt [[ושׁ]]-); Imv. fs. [[ל֫וּשִׁי]] Ge 18:6; Inf. cstr. [[מִלּוּשׁ]] Ho 7:4; Pt. fpl. [[לָשׁוֹת]] Je 7:18; —knead (obj. not expr. = [[קֶמַח סׂלֶת]]) Ge 18:6 (J), cf. 1Sa 28:24; obj. [[בָּחֵק]] dough Ho 7:4, Je 7:18 cf. 2Sa 13:8.
